title: Share of automobile sales in China in 2010 and 2025 , by segment
summary: The line representing medium-sized vehicles (C/D) had the highest values across Year with a mean value of 57.0.
This peaked at 2010 with a value of 58.0.
The line with the second highest values was Compact and mini cars (A/B) with a mean value of 36.5.
This line peaked at 2025 with a value of 37.0
gold: This statistic shows the share of automobile sales in China in 2010 and 2025 , by segment . In 2010 , premium class automobiles and limousines generated a share of 6 percent in the total sales in China .
